Workflow.Name: Version numbers are hidden when merge strategy is parallel
Workflow.Description: With a parallel merging strategy it isn't feasible to set the version as part of the merging process. This must be handled by the CI/CD platform e.g. Azure DevOps.

LocalizedName.description: Version numbers are hidden when merge strategy is parallel

Description.description: With a parallel merging strategy it isn't feasible to set the version as part of the merging process. This must be handled by the CI/CD platform e.g. Azure DevOps.
